name: Sad On Invasion
description:
Creatures called "Sad" have attacked your planet. Prevent their bullets from touching  you and the shield behind you protecting your planet.  Destroy their bullets with your bullets.

HOW TO PLAY:

Move "up" and "down" with W and S keys respectively. Shoot bullets by Right/Left Mouse Button. 

Use Escape key for "pause" or either use the pause button at the top right corner.
